products.title: Splash Paper White Roller Blind
products.description: Splash paper is a light, off white colour. It will brighten up any room wonderfully, there is nothing fresher or more clean looking than white when dressing a window. Their splash paper fabric is also moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords making them inherently child safe.

products.title: Splash Oyster Roller Blind
products.description: The splash oyster roller blind is a very light, natural cream colour. This neutral tone will work well in most spaces and look beautiful when matched with woods throughout the home. Their roller blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee providing additional peace of mind.

products.title: Splash Snow White Roller Blind
products.description: Add a bit of style to your home with this fabulous cream roller blind. products.title: Splash Dove Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Splash dove grey is a light soft grey shade, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder - great for injecting colour into any room. Their splash dove grey roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.

products.title: Splash Dark Teal Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Splash dark teal blue is a beautiful colour, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder great for injecting colour into any room. Their splash dark teal blue roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.

products.title: Splash Beige Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. This elegant cream coloured roller blind will make a wonderful addition to any room and will compliment wooden tones thoughout the home. Their roller blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee you can rest assured you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Burst Royal Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Just like a nice business suit, this blind loves to work hard and party harder. Moderate and refined, the deep royal blue is a statement of professionalism and style that works perfectly in a range of colour schemes, from neutral tones like beiges and browns, to a more blue oriented palette in which this blind will act as the foil. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric.

products.title: Burst Brownie Roller Blind
products.description: The dark, dulcet tones of the burst brownie are a work of art, filling the room with that warm, rich energy for which it is named. With the sun behind it, this blind will fill the room with a gorgeous yet restrained brown glow that will make you feel like you are stepping into a bath of melted milk chocolate. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric. Just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Burst Suede Roller Blind
products.description: Burst suede is the colour beige is trying to be. Rich yet modest, neutral toned but commanding respect, the suede has so much confidence that you could put it in any room of the house and it will be your favourite thing in each one. It will sit comfortably in any company of any colour, ideally in living spaces and bathrooms where absolute pitch black is not a necessity, instead this blind lets through enough light to keep the room gently illuminated all day.

products.title: Burst Electric Lime Roller Blind
products.description: The green colour of the burst electric lime is best suited to rooms with neutral tones so as to make the most of this colour. Ideal places for this colour blind would be in the kitchen or in a bathroom to add some colour and vibrancy to the room. As a dimout blind, this is a great fabric for filtering the light entering your room and stopping any annoying glare on your living room tv. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric.

products.title: Burst Lunar Roller Blind
products.description: The darker grey colour of the burst lunar is moody and mysterious, but yet has a charm about it that makes you want to install it in your window. This fabric is dimout so will be perfect for bathrooms, kitchens and living rooms and will help to add a darker colour accent to your home. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric. Just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Burst Atoll Roller Blind
products.description: The bright and vibrant, tropical blue colour of the burst atoll is sure to put you in a happy mood when you see it, gently reminding you of the clear and calm tropical waters you so want to enjoy. This vibrant colour is one to really standout in your home, and being a dimout fabric will getly filter the light coming through your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric.

products.title: Burst Baby Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Enjoy the soft baby blue colour in your home with the burst baby blue roller blind, perfect for gently filtering the light coming through your window and illuminating your room in a gentle blue hue. Use these blinds in your kitchen or bathroom to add a stylish edge to your decor. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric. Just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Burst Fanta Roller Blind
products.description: Enjoy the vibrancy of the burst fanta in your home and make a statement in your window. Dont shy away from this colour as it will gently filter the light, giving a warming orange hue to your room. Perfect for bathrooms, kitchens and living rooms as the dimout material will still let some light through, whilst giving you privacy in your home. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric.

products.title: Burst Lavender Breeze Roller Blind
products.description: The soft lavender tone will help to create a calming and enjoyable atmosphere in any room. Similar to walking through a field of lavender, just without the smell, this blind is ideal for bathrooms, kitchens and living rooms and will be a perfect match for whites and cream decors. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric. Just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Burst Washed Pebble Roller Blind
products.description: Ambiguity is the keyword with the washed pebble. It is so ambiguous we genuinely have no idea what colour it is. Somewhere on the grey/beige spectrum, it seems to sit around halfway giving it the remarkable ability to blend with a variety of decor styles. Placed amongst bolder colours like blues, reds or yellows, it acts to calm them down and make the room less overwhelming, whereas placing it with more earthy tones gives the room a neutral accent that sticks with grabs your attention.

products.title: Burst Dusk Sky Roller Blind
products.description: Our range of dimout fabrics are perfect for gently filtering the light entering your room. Use these to give your room privacy without blocking too much of the light from getting in. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric. Just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. These blinds are moisture resistant too so can be installed in a kitchen or bathroom. Fed up of the sun spoiling your view of the telly? Install this dimout blind and stop the glare from ruinning your favourite show.
